RelatedSentence: Two key Democrats in the U.S. Senate say Steve King , Iowa 's Republican congressman , is to blame for the impasse in the nation 's capital over immigration reform .

The Senate has passed what was billed as comprehensive immigration reform last year and New York Senator Chuck Schumer says King is the main Republican road block to getting the bill through the House .

King says he 's flattered to get credit for blocking the amnesty agenda Democrats are pushing .
